function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation due to balcony design and configuration","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission, discomfort, and reduced indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Implement proper ventilation systems, consider airflow patterns, and conduct indoor air quality assessments","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purifiers, and airflow monitoring devices","People":"Building occupants, especially those sensitive to indoor air quality","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of privacy and social distancing on balconies","Impact":"Increased risk of close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Design for privacy, promote social distancing guidelines, and provide barriers or partitions","Technologies":"Privacy screens, digital monitoring for occupancy awareness, and communication platforms for guidelines","People":"Residents and visitors using the balconies","Owner":"Property managers, architects, and community administrators"},{"Description":"Inadequate performance evaluation of the balcony space","Impact":"Unmet user requirements and dissatisfaction, leading to potential health and comfort issues","Mitigation":"Conduct user surveys, evaluate environmental quality, and consider user feedback for improvements","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring sensors, user feedback systems, and performance evaluation software","People":"Building occupants, users of the balcony space","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and architects"}]}
